text: Does anyone know how can I get 1 random blog post? I'm trying to get one random blog post to print on my homepage and for it to be different each time you refresh. I know how to do this with a HubDB but can't make it work for the blog posts...
is there an easy way to convert a year to a datetime object? So if user just provides ‘2018’ it will return one?

Hi HubSpot Developers! I hope this is not inappropriate but I'm looking for a developer to do some customization to a client's HubSpot blog. He used HubSpot and paid a flat fee for some basic customization, but he doesn't like it and would like to do more. I've looked at the code for the blog template that HubSpot made and it is convoluted and confusing to me, so i'm trying to help the client find someone with some expertise to work this out for him. If anyone is interested let me know. Thanks!
What is the easiest way to take an existing static html mega menu styled with custom css classes and make it work with hs built in navigation menu tool?
I looked into it a bit but it wasnt clear to me how to keep all the styling and apply it automatically to all generated li items
